title: Lidded Bowl
description: Bowl, one of a pair, covered fei t-sui jade carved in chrysanthemum form. This white jade, flecked with green called by the Chinese \'moss entangled in melting snow\'. Carved inside and out in four rows of petal design. Small spreading base also carved in spread petal design. Extraordinarily fragile and brilliant.  Pair with 34.21.6a,b
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
